tweets.text: 🍕 BREAKING: Pentagon orders have spiked 400% in the last hour. Multiple pizzerias reporting unusual late-night bulk orders. Pizza Index now at CRITICAL. Stay tuned for updates. #PentagonPizza
📊 Evening Update: Pizza Index holding steady at 3.8. Gay Bar Index inversely at 6.2. Pattern analysis suggests routine Friday night operations. No anomalies detected. #DataIntelligence #OSINT

🏳️‍🌈 CORRELATION ALERT: Gay bar foot traffic 65% below normal while pizza orders are up 40%. This inverse relationship has historically preceded major policy announcements. Monitoring closely. #Analysis
